sourcesContent:
const initialState = {
    token: null, //manage accessToken
    expiredAt: null, //manage expiry time of access token
    user: null, //manage user details
    authLoading: null, //to indicate auth API is in progress
    isAuthenticated: false, //authentication flag
    userLoginLoading: false, //to indicate user login API is in progress
    loginError: null //manage the error of user sigin API
}
